post.body:
Someday soon we will look back on all this and laugh at the desperation of those who tried to use their temporary positions of power and influence to silence us @a 

Truth will out. Don't back down, no matter what. You have our support, we are with you. Together we will win. Just like we always do.

post.body: @a Gab has represented the most free, unfettered & enjoyable days I have spent on the internet talking with strangers since the early days of the "ICQ" messaging service back in the mid 90's. Whatever happens from here the team behind it should be proud. Keep fighting.

post.body:
I voted for President Trump. 

I helped get him elected. 

I don‚Äôt brag about this, but in 2016 across all of my accounts I had BILLIONS of impressions supporting and defending him and America. 

Can we get one tweet defending Gab.com, our work with law enforcement to bring a terrorist to justice, and our defense of free speech online for all people? 

Is that too much to ask?

post.body:
I just had a long prayer session, but saying it nicer. Lord please send your wisdom to @a @e @amq and guide them to resolve these issues. Change the hearts of Joyent.com to give gab more time to buy with their million dollars we just sent them to develop their own hosting site, their own payment system and bless them abundantly to help others have a way to seek help, information and purchasing power. Please give them strength to be a light in the world for a light that is hidden is not seen. 
Help us overcome our own fears and anger and be a light with them. 

As Judah stood against Israel who had turned to false gods, 2 Chronicle 13, please help us to stay with you, the one true living God and overcome our enemies who try to take us down while claiming blasphemy in your name. 

Please give comfort to those who have suffered the wrath of hate. 

And above all, let gab be used for the glory of the Lord that your message may be expressed here by the fruit of our lips. 

In the name of Jesus, Amen.

post.body:
GAB IS NOT GOING ANYWHERE

I don't care what we have to do, I don't care what it takes. We will build everything from the ground up if we have to. 

We may be down for a few weeks. The truth is we do not know yet. We are working on solutions. We will figure it out. Keep fighting for freedom. We sure will be. 

Please pray for the victims and their families. I know many of you are upset at what is happening to Gab, but the focus should be on them.

post.body: Breaking: @joyent, Gab‚Äôs new hosting provider, has just pulled our hosting service. They have given us until 9am on Monday to find a solution. Gab will likely be down for weeks because of this. Working on solutions. We will never give up on defending free speech for all people.

post.body:
Free speech means you can offend, criticize, and make memes about any race, religion, ethnicity, or sexual orientation. 

Sick and tired of the double standards for ‚Äúacceptable speech‚Äù and ‚Äúprotected classes‚Äù on both the left and the right. 

Free speech for ALL about ALL.
